lyric:
[00:00.05]歌曲名 Galway Girl
[00:00.07]歌手名 Ed Sheeran
[00:00.10]Written by：Amy Wadge/Damian McKee/Johnny McDaid/Eamon Murray/Foy Vance/Ed Sheeran/Sean Graham/Niam Dunne/Liam Bradley 
[00:01.29]She played the fiddle in an Irish band 
[00:03.39]But she fell in love with an English man 
[00:05.98]Kissed her on the neck and then I took her by the hand 
[00:08.53]Said baby I just wanna dance 
[00:10.30]I met her on Grafton street right outside of the bar 
[00:13.09]She shared a cigarette with me while her brother played the guitar 
[00:15.38]She asked me what does it mean the Gaelic ink on your arm 
[00:17.78]Said it was one of my friend's songs do you want to drink on 
[00:20.07]She took Jamie as a chaser Jack for the fun 
[00:22.67]She got Arthur on the table with Johnny riding as shot gun 
[00:25.52]Chatted some more one more drink at the bar 
[00:27.63]Then put Van on the jukebox got up to dance you know 
[00:30.27]She played the fiddle in an Irish band 
[00:32.32]But she fell in love with an English man 
[00:34.76]Kissed her on the neck and then I took her by the hand 
[00:37.26]Said baby I just wanna dance 
[00:38.85]With my pretty little Galway Girl 
[00:43.64]You're my pretty little Galway Girl 
[00:47.83]Hey 
[00:49.10]You know she beat me at darts and then she beat me at pool 
[00:51.65]And then she kissed me like there was nobody else in the room 
[00:53.89]As last orders were called was when she stood on the stool 
[00:56.51]After dancing the Ceili singing to trad tunes 
[00:58.70]I never heard Carrickfergus ever sung so sweet 
[01:01.27]Acapella in the bar using her feet for a beat 
[01:03.51]Oh I could have that voice playing on repeat for a week 
[01:05.91]And in this packed out room swear she was singing to me 
[01:08.25]You know she played the fiddle in an Irish band 
[01:10.55]But she fell in love with an English man 
[01:13.04]Kissed her on the neck and then I took her by the hand 
[01:15.73]Said baby I just wanna dance 
[01:17.48]My pretty little Galway girl 
[01:21.17]My my my my my my my Galway girl 
[01:25.76]My my my my my my my Galway girl 
[01:30.58]My my my my my my my Galway girl 
[01:37.21]Now we've outstayed our welcome and it's closing time 
[01:39.66]I was holding her hand her hand was holding mine 
[01:42.10]Our coats both smell of smoke whisky and wine 
[01:44.40]As we fill up our lungs with the cold air of the night 
[01:46.89]I walked her home then she took me inside 
[01:49.39]Finished some Doritos and another bottle of wine 
[01:51.43]I swear I'm gonna put you in a song that I write 
[01:54.08]About a Galway girl and a perfect night 
[01:56.53]She played the fiddle in an Irish band 
[01:58.57]But she fell in love with an English man 
[02:01.17]Kissed her on the neck and then I took her by the hand 
[02:03.81]Said baby I just wanna dance 
[02:05.41]My pretty little Galway girl 
[02:08.95]My my my my my my my Galway girl 
[02:13.74]My my my my my my my Galway girl 
[02:18.53]My my my my my my my Galway girl 
[02:23.02]Hey
